name: Warframe Fandom Wiki Dark
description: A dark theme specifically for the Warframe Fandom Wiki. Also check out Warframe Fandom Sidebar Removal if you prefer a cleaner look with more article space.
additional_info:
Forked from:
Fandom Dark Theme, by Blyad, CC BY-SA

Extra additions for Warframe, by me.

22/12/2020:
Fixed visibility of math formulas in png images.

11/11/2020:
Damage colors, Damage icons, Pos/Neg value coloring, Hover tooltips, Mainpage sidebar, Various table fixes, Comment section fixes, WF Language glyphs, Faction icons, Syndicate icons, Polarity icons.

05/11/2020:
Initial fork with warframe wiki specific additions.
